item.title: Representations 2
item.author: shawn.graham@carleton.ca (Dr. Shawn Graham)
item.description: Communities Goals for this week this that the other thing Read 2.3 Interpretation Anderson, Annie, and Ashley Rogers, Emily Potter, Elon Cook, Karleen Gardner, Mike Murawski, Swarupa Anila, and Alyssa Machida. 2019. “Interpretation: Liberating the Narrative” in MASSAction, Museums As Site for Social Action, toolkit, https://static1.squarespace.com/static/58fa685dff7c50f78be5f2b2/t/59dcdd27e5dd5b5a1b51d9d8/1507646780650/TOOLKIT_10_2017.pdf Canning, Erin. 2019. Affect in Information Systems: A Knowledge Organization System Approach to Documenting Visitor-Artwork Experiences. Museums and the Web https://mw19.mwconf.org/paper/affect-in-information-systems-a-knowledge-organization-system-approach-to-documenting-visitor-artwork-experiences/ 2.4 Online Exhibits: Cooked Data Drucker, Johanna.
